dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The most terrible intelligence imaginable, Mr. President.

dialogues.text: The President hesitates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Load a series of 740 missiles. Maximum shield protection.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Staedert?  Get out of there immediately! I don't want an incident, do you hear me, Staedert?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (worried) ...What do we have that's bigger than 240?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

Ha grabs a cigarette, and stops to light.  He shuts oft the alarm.  He hears a cat mewing in still rings.  Korben takes a moment and then realizes it that is ringing.

dialogues.text: (ironical) You still pining for that two timing bitch. Forget her. There are a million women out there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't exist bud.

dialogues.text: Korben finds a box of matches with three matches.  He str does not light.  Korben opens the fridge, bare, except fo GEMINI croquettes. On the packet is an ad: WIN A DREAM TRIP FOR 2 TO FHLOSTON PARADISE.

dialogues.text: Must be an old picture.. Listen, you gotta bring me your hack for the 6 month overhaul.  A.S.A.P.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Finger has hang up.  Korben sighs and does the same.  He brackish water and sits down.  The cat pounces on the tab its food.  Korben pours half the coffee in the cat's cup. The cat meows.  Korben taps his cup to the cat's saucer.

dialogues.text: The office is emptied, only a few army officers remain. manuscript, Billy's drawings, sits in front of the Presid turns page after page, illustrating his point.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: The manuscript is open on the President's desk.. CLOSE ON Billy's rendering of the Mondoshawan.

dialogues.text: (to the President) The Mondoshawans don't belong to the Federated Territories, but they are peaceful... in their possession are the four elements of life. These elements when they are gathered around a fifth: The Supreme Being, ultimate warrior, created to protect life......

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SUPREME BEING is standing, as if frozen in armor.  Al bottom half of his body.  Big metallic gloves hold the ca the emblem of the three suns containing the four Sacred S

dialogues.text: The President points to the spot occupied by the 5th elem

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, we have a Mondoshawan spaceship at the frontier requesting permission to enter our territory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess I should make a decision..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are the only ones who can help..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir..the Mondoshawan do not belong to the federation. We do not know their intention.. I must recommend a full trinuclear assault..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (yells) Did you see that..thing..swallow our battleship like a gum drop?  You can't even tell me what it is! I ask you for options you give me bullshit. Give them permission to enter our territories with my warmest regards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (relieved) Thank you, Mr. President.

dialogues.text: Learning our history! The last 5000 years that she missed! She's been out of circulation a while, you know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo breaks into her childish laughter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're you laughing about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pronouncing badly) Napoleon... small.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She laughs again and tosses some capsules into the microw

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hesitant) Uh father, I know she's been through a lot... but the sacred stones..we don't have much time..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Of course..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo takes her plate out of the microwave.  A steaming with chicken and exotic vegetables.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo..I'm sorry to interrupt you but..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sits back down in front of the screen and chomps away second chicken.  Cornelius sits opposite her. and holds u handle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (serious) The case..with the stones... Where is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: San Agamat chay bet... envolet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The case was stolen?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo nods her head, quite unperturbed and continues to in front of her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shocked) Who in gods name would do such a thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON: A pair of feet limping heavily.  A MAN comes al

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me sir, the council is worried about the economy heating up.  They wondered if it would be possible to fire 500...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They reach a door at the end of the corridor.  Zorg enter

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fire 1000.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But... 500 is all they need, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ZORG turns slowly.  A small scar across run across his fa stutters. This is not a man to cross, or contradict.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1000! Fine, sir! Sorry to have disturbed you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door opens...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... and David enters carrying a bundle of clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There was this guy with a limp who came a month ago..said he was an art dealer ... Asking all these questions about the Sacred Stones..at the time I didn't think anything of it.. What was his name? I'm so bad with names...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Leeloo, timid) I didn't know your size.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo is happy. She pulls off the towel and stands there and David turn away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They really made her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perfect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo finishes dressing. She is delighted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to David) Domo danko!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David smiles, dumb with admiration.  Cornelius comes over

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo?  The Stones... We must get them back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo settles down, sits at the computer and turns it on

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ikset-kiba.  Me imanetaba oum dalat!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know exactly where they are!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A group of handsome WARRIORS approaches.  AKNOT, their le sacred case in his hands.  The metal handle is missing bu metal glove is still grasping the case.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pretending to be worried) Aknot?  Is that you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The LEADER nods. A disgusted look stamps Zorg's features.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...What an ugly face! Doesn't suit you at all! Take it off...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AKNOT's face burns away revealing the head of a monstrous

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's better! Never be ashamed of who you are... You're warriors... be proud...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AKNOT says nothing, but if his eyes could talk!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what if the Federal Army crushed your entire race and scattered your people to the wind... Your time for revenge is at hand... Voila... the ZF1.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes out a weapon from one a crate and goes into a sa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (very fast) ...It's light... the handle's adjustable for easy carrying... good for righties and lefties.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, two MEN set up a mannequin rigged with various mechanisms at the far end of the warehouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Breaks down into four parts, undetectable by X-rays.. It's the ideal weapon for quick, discreet interventions.  A word on fire power: Titanium recharger. 3000 round clip with bursts of 3 to 300. With the replay button, another Zorg innovation, it's even easier... one shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He fires at the mannequin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... and replay sends every following shot to the same location...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg spins around, the rounds all hit the mannequin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (even faster) I recharge, but the enemy has launched a cowardly sneak attack from behind, the automirror takes care of that.  Gives me the time to turn around and finish the job. 300 round bursts, then there are the Zorg oldies...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He fires off each item he names.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Rocket launcher.  The always efficient flame thrower... My favorite. Our famous net launcher, the arrow launcher, with exploding or poisonous gas heads - very practical. And for the grand finale, the all-new ice-cube system!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mannequin has been blasted into a pile of ashes cover stuck with arrows, the whole mess frozen solid. He tosses AKNOT's hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Four full crates, delivered right on time! What about you, my dear Aknot, did you bring me what I asked you for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AKNOT sets the case on a crate.  Zorg gloats while stroki

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Magnificent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg smiles, takes a deep breath, opens the case.  It's e

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo breaks into her childish laughter once again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (astonished) What do you mean empty?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AKNOT looks into the case.  Things grow tense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright..I've got an open mind here.. anyone care to explain?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo explains what happened in her language.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (translating) She says that the Guardians never really had much faith in humans. They were afraid of being attacked. The stones were given to someone they could trust who took another route. She's supposed to contact this person in a little less than twelve hours from now in a hotel. She's looking for the address!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A map of the stars flashes onto the screen, Leeloo points

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The little group comes over to look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Planet Fhloston, in the Angel constellation

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius plops down into his armchair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...We're saved!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm fucked!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg calmly closes the case and gives Aknot a blood-chill

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You asked for a case. We brought you a case.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shouting) A case with four stones in it. Not one! Not two or three! But four!!! Four stones!!! What the fuck am I supposed to do with an EMPTY case?!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AKNOT's men grow edgy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tense) ...We are warriors, not merchants!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (humored) But you can still count.  Look... my fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He holds up four fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Four stones, four crates... Zero stones... (yelling) ZERO CRATES!!! (to his men) Put everything back, we're outta here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AKNOT's warriors turn their weapons on Zorg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (icily) We risked our lives. I believe a little compensation is in order.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling) So, you are a merchant, after all. (to his men) Leave them one crate.  For the cause!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg's men leave a crate and exit with the other three.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg walks along the street to his limo.  RIGHT ARM carri case.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't like warriors!  They're too narrow-minded, no sublety.  Worse, they fight for hopeless causes..for honor! Honor has killed millions of people but hasn't saved a single one. (pause) You know what -- do I like though, I like killer. A real dyed in the wool killer.  Cold-blooded. Clean.  Methodical.  Thorough.  A killer, when he picked up the ZF1, would've immediately asked about the little red button on the bottom of the gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warriors have all taken a weapon. One of them inspect turns it over and notices the little red button. He press

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind Zorg, an ear-shattering explosion levels the wareh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (impassive) Bring the priest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben is finishing a Thai meal, cooked by a Thai on his anchored at the window. The cat eats next to Korben, cont

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you forgive me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cat meows just as a red light blinks, announcing the message in a glass tube.  Korben ignores it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not going to open?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never gotten a message that wasn't bad news.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How someone strong like you scared from a message? Is good news I sure!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last two messages I got?  The first one was from my wife telling me she was leaving! And the second was from my lawyer telling me he was leaving too... with my wife.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You right that is bad.. but mathematically luck must change! Grandfather say: "It never rain every day." This is good news guarantee.. I bet you lunch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben hesitates, then gives the envelope to the Thai, wh a big smile that fades as reads the contents aloud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...You're fired. Oh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben smiles at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least I won lunch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good philosophy..see good in bad.. I like..I prepare number one dessert.. special for you and pussy..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cat meows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo is polishing of' an immense pile of dessert as Dav the computer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got it!  Everything  here we need to know about Fhloston Paradise Hotel... and a detailed blueprint of the entire hotel!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good work, my son.  Now all we need is a way to get there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doorbell rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll get it.  Finish your work my son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius opens to Right Arm with armed escort.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father Cornelius?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My son?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Zorg would like a word with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg turns to Cornelius.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg. Jean-Baptiste Emmanuel Zorg... nice to see you again

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I remember you now..the so called art dealer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm glad you got your memory back, Father... Because you're going to need it... Where are the stones?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Why on earth do the stones interest you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Personally, they are of no interest to me, I'd rather sell weapons..but I have a customer... so tell me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even it I did know where the stones were I would never tell somebody like you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?  What's wrong with me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...I'm a priest! I'm here to serve life, All you want to do is destroy it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, Father... You are so wrong. Let me explain...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg leads Cornelius into his inner office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...would you like a drink?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Follow me.. Life, which you so nobly serve, comes from destruction. Look at this empty glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg pushes the glass with his finger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here it is... peaceful... serene... but if it is...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg pushes the glass off the table.  It shatters on the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Destroyed...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Small individual robots, both free-wheeling and integrate out to clean up the mess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Look at all these little things... so busy all of a sudden. Notice how each one is useful. What a lovely ballet, so full of form and color.  So full of..life!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are robots!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SERVANT comes in pours water in another glass.  Zorg to into it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes but... by that simple gesture of destruction. I gave work to at least fifty people today. The engineers, the technicians, the mechanics. Fifty people who will be able to feed their children so they can grow up big and strong.  Children who will have children of their own, adding to the great cycle of life!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius sits in silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father, by creating a little destruction, I am, in fact, encouraging life!  So, in reality, you and I are in the same business!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Destroying a glass is one thing..killing people with the weapons you produce is quite another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me reassure you Father..I will never kill more people in my entire life than religion has killed in the last 2000 years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg smiles, holds up the glass and takes a drink. Unfortunately, he chokes on the cherry.  Unable to breath to panic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mocking) Where's the robot to pat your back?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg falls, writhing, on his desk, inadvertently hitting trigger a slew of little mechanisms.  They pop out all ov True chaos reigns.  Even a cage appears, holding a Soulim multicolored beastie, PICASSO, who seems surprised to be licks his half-dead master in thanks.  Cornelius gets up the desk.  Zorg motions for help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I give you a hand?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius whacks him on the back.  The cherry comes flyin regains control of himself. GUARDS come running in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You saved my life... So, I'm going to spare yours. (to the GUARDS) Throw him out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GUARDS throw Cornelius out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are a monster, Zorg!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (complimented) I know...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GUARDS drag Cornelius out of the office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Torture whoever you want, the president if you have to but I want those Stones. You have an hour.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right Arm salutes and hurries out of the office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...The dark planet. Three warships are positioned in fron Communication satellites arrive from all over the place, a magnet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (observing) It's gobbling up all the communication satellites in the galaxy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: President Lindberg appears even more crushed by recent ev

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why the hell is it eating up all those satellites like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (desperate) ...We're working on it, Mr. President. We're working on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It should only choke on them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MUNRO enters the office just as a cockroach crawls onto t There's a small antenna on its back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg's Right Arm wears earphones, monitoring the Presiden with the cockroach-spy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I managed to contact the Mondoshawan. They deplore the incident, but accept our apologies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (relieved) And the Stones?  Did you find them in the wreckage?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The-Stones weren't aboard the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (surprised) ...What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President is all ears. So is Zorg's Right Arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mondoshawan never fully trusted the human race..they felt we're too unpredictable.. so they gave up the Stones to somebody they do trust. Her name is Plavalaguna. She's a Diva and she's going to sing at the charity ball on Fhloston Paradise in a few hours.  She has the Stones with her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President breathes easier. Zorg's Right Arm is delighted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (taking off a shoe) Excellent!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President crushes the cockroach with his shoe. Right Arm's earphones fly off his head. Good-bye eardrums

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want your best man on this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, Sir. I have the perfect one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C.U. The most disgusting dessert ever made.  Korben looks on a plate as the Thai serves it to him proudly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stewed jellyfish cake.. my speciality..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben forces a weak, polite smile as the Thai looks on e phone rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saved by the bell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben rises to get his cigarettes, and answer the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the nastiest dirtbag I know in this stinking City!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (resigned) Hi Ma...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been playing twice a week for 20 years, 20 years I've been eating those shitty croquettes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben goes to light his cigarette.  There are only two m the match box. Korben strikes one and it fizzles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wouldn't even eat one to help your poor mother, and you win the big prize? Know something? The whole thing makes me sick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Thai starts to clean up.  Just as Korben goes to stri match..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you listening to me, you ingrate!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (resigned) Yes ma..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben sighs and puts the match back in the box. Korben enters his code on the keypad the Thai is holding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the Thai) Go on... This is gonna take a while!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Thai casts oft.  Korben closes the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Other than that... You all right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...And now you're making fun of me? I'm warning you! If you don't take me after all these years of sacrifice, I'll never forgive you!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Thai flies off.  In the hall, the cat meows-for more

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the cat) I'm coming!. Ma, what're you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I get it! You want to make me beg, is that it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All I want is an explanation! I just got in, I lost my job. I smashed my cab. I got mugged, but other than that everything's peachy, Ma, thanks for asking!! Now settle down and explain to me calmly..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A message drops in his tube.  The red light goes on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You just won a trip, you dolt! Ten days in Fhloston Paradise for two!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ma. If I'd won, I'd know about it. Someone would have notified me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They've been blaring out your name on the radio for the last hour, blockhead!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He eyeballs the message still in the tube.  The doorbell

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ma.. it's the door. I'll call you back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben hangs up before his mother can say anything and he door.  Before he gets there it opens, General Munro enter Captain and a Major. MAJOR ICEBORG is a woman. All she needs to become a man i Munro opens a file.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (clipped) Major Dallas, if our calculations are correct you still have 57 hours owed to the Federal Army on your enlistment which is more than you will need for a mission of the utmost importance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What mission?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To save the world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where have I heard this song before?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're to leave immediately for Fhloston Paradise. Retrieve four Stones from the Diva Plavalaguna. And bring them back with the utmost discretion as possible. Any questions'?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a little bewildered) Just one... why me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three reasons... One: As part of The Elite Special Forces Unit of the Federated Army you are an expert in the use of all weapons and spacecraft needed for this mission.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Munro pulls out a long list of documents.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two: Of all the members of your unit you were the most highly decorated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the third one?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the only one left alive...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Munro removes the message Korben hasn't bothered to look

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you open your messages?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've had enough good news for today

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (by rote) You have won the annual Gemini contest and a trip to Fhloston Paradise. For two. Congratulations. Here are your tickets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hands Korben the tickets.  Korben gets it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You rigged the contest?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Munro nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Major Iceborg will accompany you... as your wife...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The idea of taking a trip with Iceborg makes him sick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sarcastic) You couldn't come up with something a little more discreet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Old tricks are the best tricks eh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not going.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One reason... I want to stay the only one left alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo and Cornelius search for Korben's apartment. Leelo card Korben gave her.  Cornelius finds the apartment, and number off the door.  He waves Leeloo over as his hand go

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doorbell rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Scuse me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben goes to the door and looks out the peephole: the b Korben panics, overcome with happiness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (worried) What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben has two seconds to make up something to get rid of

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's my wife.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you were divorced.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean my future.. my ex.. My future ex.. if she sees you here I'm finished.  She hates you guys. It's what killed us in the first place. Please...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He puts them in the fridge, shoving the jellyfish cake in hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Sorry, General, but we've got no choice! It'll only take a minute! Let me set up another meeting and I'll be back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three of us will never fit in there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pushing him) Oh, yes you will...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben slams the fridge door.  The doorbell RINGS again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Coming!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He whips through his place in ten seconds, gathers up thi about, shuts drawers, rolls up his laundry in the folding bed. H hair back and opens the door with a big smile only to discover a gu his eyes held by Cornelius.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Apipoulai!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I suppose that means "Hi" ?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry to have to resort to such methods, but we heard about your good luck on he radio and we need the tickets to Fhloston.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that the usual way priests go on vacation?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not going on vacation..we're on a mission..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What kind of mission?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sincere) We have to save the world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (skeptical) Good luck..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father, I was in the Army for awhile and every time they told us we were on a mission to save the world the only thing that changed was I lost a lot of friends. So thanks for the offer.. but no thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius is disappointed.  Leeloo looks crestfallen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a police control action..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone freezes as the whole building resounds with the voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A group of POLICEMEN bursts into the hallway.  One of the code on the police wall box.  A device descends from the flashing light-siren, a VOICE fills the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is not an exercise. This is a police control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius starts to panic.  Korben takes charge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god oh my god..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben pushes a button sending the fridge to the next flo takes it's place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo, hide in here and don't move!

dialogues.text: Leeloo hops in.  Korben tosses Cornelius on the bed.

dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ..and hits a button on the wall.  The bed disappears into Korben grabs his tickets and slides them in his belt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Korben takes his time hiding his face. The Cop looks at h looking for a... KORBEN DALLAS. He has his picture, but it is Korben and beard.

dialogues.text: (to COP 2) Sir? Are you a human?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'm a meat popsicle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C.U. Korben's calling card is clumsily stuck to the door neighbor's apartment.  COP 3 slaps the viewer on the nast The neighbor is at his sink shaving instead of against th arrives with Korben's picture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, this is a control.  Please put your hands in the yellow circles.

dialogues.text: The neighbor steps right up to the viewer, shaving cream could pass for Korben.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck you!!

dialogues.text: Korben still has his hands to the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wrong answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHOT O.S. EXPLOSION.  Scuffle.

dialogues.text: The riot police hustle down the hall dragging the neighbo a canvas bag.  A cop is on the wall phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK, we got the guy under wraps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was not easy, but we bagged him!. Thanks for the tip!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling) Glad to help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They just arrested the guy for Uranium smuggling. Everything's going as planned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All I have to do now is to go to the airport and take his place.  I should be in Fhloston in less than four hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg sits there quietly for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't come back without the Stones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben opens the shower door.  Leeloo is soaking wet, her chattering from the cold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm really sorry.. there wasn't time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His eyes fall on an old blanket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here let me wrap you up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben wraps her in an blanket and vigoroualy rubs her ba warms gradually and snuggles closer to that warm comforta Korben's rubbing slows, looking more like caresses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ..It's funny.  I've met you twice today  and you've ended up in my arms both times.

dialogues.text: Leeloo suddenly realizes that she has maybe gone a bit to She recovers, looking embarrassed too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (nicely) Valo massa... Chacha hamas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh..you're welcome.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The intimacy makes him nervous.  He looks for a diversion

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coffee!  That's what you need! A nice, hot cup of coffee!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pushes a button on the coffee machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With some honey!  You'll see, honey's great!...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben rummages through the drawer.  Leeloo, innocent, do quite understand everything that is going on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hot cup of coffee... with honey...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He rummages through the cupboard, exceedingly nervous.  L begins to look around.  She opens a drawer and comes upon

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (nervously) I've got this great honey somewhere. You know about honey?  There used to be these little animals who made it with antenna...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ..pictures of Major Korben Dallas War Hero.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ..and these other animals who ate it.. one were bees the other were bears..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks back to the man fumbling for honey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I forget which ate it and which made it but..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And she smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here it is!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben holds up the jar of honey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taste this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo innocently sticks his finger in the jar then puts

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It... melts in your mouth, doesn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She savors the honey, slowly; sensually.  Her lips shine eyes narrow with pleasure.  Korben is hypnotized by her l attracted to a flame.  He begins to lose control, which m An indistinct sound comes from the wall.  But Korben is s the sight of Leeloo licking her honied fingers, he doesn' it becomes quite a racket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You hear that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (licking) Cornelius..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh god!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben pushes the button on the wall.  The bed pops out, Cornelius tucked in it, struggling to get out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm really sorry.. let me help you..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben begins to pull at the covers when..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Achta ge lumitai de matala..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben turns..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to Leeloo struggling out of her wet clothes. His away by the sight of her perfect body. Cornelius whacks him heavily on the head with a lamp.  Ko the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (displeased) Vano da, mechteba?! Soun domo kala chon hammas!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'm not proud of myself... But we don't have the luxury of choice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The POLICE exit the elevator and head for the front door. takes a hit from a silencer, then a second. Others are ba by MANGALORE warriors.  One of them picks up the prisoner into a small shed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aknot, the Mangalore leader, is seriously wounded and can

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben Dallas!  We got him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perfect... Take command, Akanit. Go to Fhloston and get the Stones... If Zorg really wants them... He'll have to negotiate.  Revenge is at hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben gets unsteadily to his feet, some blood drips down daubs at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus!... Some priest!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The phone rings, he manages to answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you pulled yourself together?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Not yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hangs up. Korben opens the fridge door.  The three officers are fro Korben grabs some ice, presses it to his forehead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take the mission.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He closes the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius and Leeloo (still damp) arrive at the Manhattan Airport. A huge hall three quarters filled with trash piled up to There are groups of extra-terrestrials on strike standing holding picket signs.  A SECURITY GUARD picks up a phone

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Illegal gathering in Zone 4.

dialogues.text: A hand taps Leeloo from behind.  She whips around catchin face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo, be careful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to David who in holding his bloody nose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you get them?

dialogues.text: David hands Cornelius two passports.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excellent... Leeloo Dallas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hands it to her.  The name makes her smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Korben David Dallas.

dialogues.text: She frowns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Akta dedero ansila do mektet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't pretend to be your husband... David's in great shape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks at David holding his bloody nose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He'll protect you. Go on... See the Diva... get the Stones... See you at the temple... God be with you.

dialogues.text: ANGLE ON: Korben comes rushing into the airport. Walking scopes the hall looking for Leeloo. A POLICE PATROL beari STRIKERS jostles him. The cops open fire.  The strikers d and disappear.

dialogues.text: David nervously puts tickets and IDs on the check-in coun Leeloo tosses her suitcase on the conveyor belt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Congratulations on winning the contest.

dialogues.text: David gives her a bleak smile.  Leeloo rolls her eyes. Back a ways, Korben has spotted Leeloo and... David.  He them.  Leeloo's seen him. She is both delighted and panic seen nothing.  Korben presses one of his fingers like a g

dialogues.text: (friendly) Hey! I really thought I was going to miss my flight! (to David) Thanks, kid! You put the luggage on the conveyor belt?

dialogues.text: (freaking) Uh... yeah.

dialogues.text: (smiling) Great! Now beat it!

dialogues.text: He looks at David's fake ID.

dialogues.text: ...My cousin David...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo is unable to hold back a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking at Leeloo's ID) Your wife?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben grabs the ID and reads it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, yes... Newlyweds. (aside) You know how it is... Love at first sight. You meet, something goes tilt,. you get married, you hardly know each other. Right, darling?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo rips her boarding card out of the attendant's hand

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sharply) Dinoine chagantakat!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Took the words right out of my mouth. Go on... I'll be right with you. (to Check-in Attendant) It's our honeymoon. We're going to use the trip to get to know each other better.

dialogues.text: He winks at the stewardess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The neighbor and a tawdry young girl cross the airport. almost knocked over by a police patrol holding a 500 poun stainless steel leash. The couple panics a moment, the re isn't for them. The pig heads for the pile where the stri

dialogues.text: (to pig) Come on, snyffer, go root!

dialogues.text: (to the bartender) I feel so guilty sending her to do the dirty work. I know she was made to be strong but she's also so fragile... So human. You know what I mean?

dialogues.text: The bartender, a robot, nods his head as he pours Corneli

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (surprised) Dallas... Korben...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling) Just a minute, please.

dialogues.text: She hits a silent alarm, but the Mangalores feel somethin

dialogues.text: We'll be right back ... we're gonna check out the duty free...

dialogues.text: Cornelius at the bar, half in the bag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The same?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make that two...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius turns to David.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Leeloo?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the plane... with Mr. Dallas... the real one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's all my fault.  I'm the servant... It's my mission! Here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hands David the Temple Key from around his neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here's the key to the Temple.. Prepare for our arrival!

dialogues.text: Cornelius tosses David's drink into his own, downs it all and takes off, passing the Mangalore couple headed for th very nervous. A police patrol is coming.  This time, it seems to be for

dialogues.text: The tawdry girl nods and peels off. The neighbor takes ou blasts away at the cops.  The cops fire back. A firefight hall. The tawdry girl dives into a pile of garbage and di

dialogues.text: Leeloo stands at the buffet in the first class lounge eat in sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben is led down the hall by a STEWARDESS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are so lucky... Loc Rhod is the coolest DJ in the universe.

dialogues.text: Listen... I don't want to be interviewed. I'd prefer to remain anonymous.

dialogues.text: The stewardess stops in the corridor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forget anonymous.  You'll be doing Loc Rhod's live show every day from 5 to 7!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (expression changes) You gotta be kidding!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stewardess smiles and shakes her head.  The door next swings open and smashes him in the face. In walks LOC RHOD amidst a tornado of music and security young, good-looking, eccentric, charming as an elf or sly bundle of energy.  He is the 24th century's most popular

dialogues.text: (speedy, in rhythm) Korben Dallas! Here he is The most hated man in the universe. The one and only winner of the Gemini Croquette contest! Ladies, start melting 'cause the boy's hot! Hot! Hot! The boy is perfect.. (he feels his muscles) ...The right size, right build, right hair.  Right on! Say something-to those 50 billion pair of ears out there D-man!

dialogues.text: An ASSISTANT hands a totally lost Korben a mike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hesitant) ...Hi.

dialogues.text: Does it get any better or what!

dialogues.text: Loc Rhod grabs Korben's arm and leads him down the hallwa the music.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Quiver ladies, he's gonna set the world on fire right here from 5 to 7! You'll know everything there is to know about the D-man. His dreams, his desires, his most intimate of intimates.  And from what I'm looking at intimate is the stud muffin's middle name. So tell me my main man... you nervous in the service?

dialogues.text: Uh... not really.

dialogues.text: Loc Rhod lets go of Korben's arm and grabs the Stewardess

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freeze those knees, my chickadees, 'cause Korben is on the case with a major face...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Start drooling, ladies! My man here is a sharp-tongued Sire who's gonna stroke your every desire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yesterday's unknown will be tomorrow's Prince of Fhloston Paradise, the hotel of a thousand and one follies, home of luxury and beauty.  A magic fountain flowing with non-stop wine, women and Bootchie Koochie Koo...

dialogues.text: He tosses away his champagne glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beware out there puppy dogs my man is on the prowl. Owwww!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...And start licking your stamps little girls, this guy's gonna have you writing home to Momma! Tomorrow from 5 to 7, I'll be your voice, your tongue and I'll be hot on the tail of the sexiest man of the year... D-man... Your man... My man.

dialogues.text: The stewardess shivers.  A BEEP is heard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: End of transmission.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MUSIC suddenly stops.  Several assistants come and co Rhod who sighs, lights up a cigarette, and drops his pret

dialogues.text: Korben sweetheart do me a favor I know this is probably the biggest thing that ever happened to you in your inconsequential life. But I've got a show to do here and it's got to pop. So tomorrow, when we're on air, give me a hand... Try to make believe you have more than a one word vocabulary. OK pal?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That does it.  Korben grabs him by the collar and drags h corner. Loc Rhod's feet don't touch the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pissed) I didn't come here to play Dumbo on the radio. So tomorrow between 5 and 7 give yourself a hand, that clear pal?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (petrified) Crystal.

dialogues.text: The Check-in attendant has two more tickets in her hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (alter a moment, reading) ...Mr. Dallas... Korben Dallas?

dialogues.text: Zorg's Right Arm gives her a big smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The attendant scans the ID with a yellow beam, it checks blue light reveals no other face but his.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The problem is I only have one Korben Dallas on my list... and he's already checked in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right Arm's smile shatters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's impossible!  He's in j... I mean, there must be some mistake. I have my ticket! I'm the real Korben Dallas!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A shrill BELL rings out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling) I'm sorry, sir, boarding is finished.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The attendant hits a button.  A thick window slowly slide them. Right Arm totally loses it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want to see your boss!  Get rid of this fucking window! Somebody's made a mistake, goddamnit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pounds on the counter with both fists. A steel curtain Red sighting beams target spots on his body, ten gun barr the wall, all aimed at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is not an exercise.  This is a police control. Put your hands in the nearest yellow circles...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (slowing down) Sorry, my fault... Just a little overexcited... that's all... I'm calm now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben makes his way in the plane  looking for his seat. modern planes, just individual travel boxes lined up like passes STEWARD holding his bloodied nose. He has found wh for. He enters to.... Leeloo quietly stretched out in fro screen.  Korben slips in beside her.  Leeloo in concentra that scroll rapidly  past her on the screen.  He doesn't is doing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Apipoulai!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not hard to find you...just follow the Chaos...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo smiles, as if complimented.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo, listen to me... these tickets... they're not mine... I mean they are, but not for vacation like everyone thinks... I'm on an operation... and if I didn't come get you, you'd be in a shitload of trouble... I'd love to be on vacation with you... but now.... now I've got to work... And Leeloo... I would love to work in peace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo types in "LOVE" on the keyboard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Love...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! But "love" isn't the operative word here, PEACE is!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo types in this new word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (rather pleased) Peace... and love...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She brings up a picture of a 60's style Hippie flashing a Korben sighs and switches off the screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sometimes you can't learn everything from a screen..sometimes it's better to ask someone who has experience..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quite happy) What is... Make Love?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben just stares at her for a few minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Know what? On that subject maybe you'd be better off asking the screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns the computer back on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A STEWARDESS walks up the aisle of the shuttle pushing th top of each individual box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...to make your flight as short and agreeable as possible, our flight attendants are switching on the timing sleeper which will regulate your sleep during the trip...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (switching off the screen) OK! Finished!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finished what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Learning language.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which one?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All 900.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben doesn't know if he should laugh or not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: (smiling) Apipoulai!
