dialogues.text: The Diva switches from classical music to funk, picking u

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A WARRIOR whips out the biggest knife ever made and rushe disarms him gracefully.  A violent fight breaks out.  The Leeloo dances.  The Mangalores pay a heavy price for the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hearing noise from inside the suite, the Mangalore by the nervous.  He runs for reinforcements.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius enters the police station wearing handcuffs.  T Police is behind him holding a gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo knocks out the last Mangalore just as the Diva fin to a burst of applause.  The Diva takes a bow.   So does

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Akanit and his men listen to the concert. The Mangalore g

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They were waiting for us! It was an ambush!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If it's war they want it's war they'll get! Enact the Final Plan!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the Mangalores cock their weapons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo is about to open the case when the door EXPLODES. holding a ZF1.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My compliments, little lady! ...And thanks for doing all the dirty work! I couldn't have done it any better myself! (sharply) ...Now hand over the Stones!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo smiles and hands him the case.  Zorg arms the ZF1 to kill her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice knowing you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo catches on quickly.  She kicks the scotch bottle o the gun which throws Zorg's shot off.  She jumps to the c disappears in an air vent.  Furious, Zorg fires at the ce

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo dodges the bullets as best as she can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg fires his 3000 round clip.  The ceiling looks like a cheese.  Zorg sticks a small cylinder in the wall and fli numbers flashing by tell us it's a bomb.  The timer reads seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with a crafty smile) You can run but you can't hide...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius is seated opposite the Chief of Police.  A MEDI the chief's head.  The door explodes.  The cop outside in bullets.  A dozen Mangalores attack the police office.  A their head.  The policemen are caught unaware.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody move! We're taking over this ship!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chief of Police is goggle-eyed.  Cornelius leans towa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pleased with himself) I told you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg has the case and exits the suite just as the general He sighs in exasperation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three Mangalores suddenly rush into the opera hall shooti

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is panic all around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (broadcasting, panic stricken) Ladies and gentlemen, I think we're being... attacked.  The place is crawling with warriors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: President Lindberg and his generals look very worried.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some security guards open fire one of the Mangalores is h turn their guns on the cops.  People scream, diving for c his time. More Mangalores rush in from all around shooting.  Two co The Diva... takes a bullet. She falls from the stage into Korben's arms. He lowers he Korben ignores the panic all around and wraps her in his trying to stop the blue blood spurting from her wounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg's ZFX200 speeds away from the boat.  Zorg is at the devilish smile on his lips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want something done, do it yourself!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fighting rages all around in the concert hall, but Korben it.  He sets the Diva's head delicately on the floor.  Lo nearby, still on the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (voice low, panicked) They're hideous. They've got a crest on the head, the eyes of a toad and fingers all over their hands. Totally hideous!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (worried) ...Mangalores!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Send a battalion out immediately!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the Diva) I was sent by the government to help you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry.  This is my fate... How was the concert?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben is a little surprised, but... the Diva is an artis

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never heard anything so beautiful in my life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Mangalore jumps on them from the stage.  Korben makes s and grabs his gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (weak) You're a good man... She was right to have chosen you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Fifth Element... The Supreme Being... Your wife...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben is floored.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo... is... she's...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, and more than that... You must give her the Stones, she's the only one who knows how to use them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself, suddenly realizing) ...So Cornelius was telling the truth!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mangalores tie up Cornelius and the Chief of Police t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the Chief of Police) Of course I was telling you the truth!... If you had listened to me in the first place, we wouldn't be in this predicament now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben wastes two more Mangalores.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She needs you. She needs your help and your love. She's more fragile than she seems...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben looks around, ready for another attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Yeah, so am I.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Diva takes his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She was taught to love the life of others... but not her own. You have to teach her to love if you want her to truly live!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (uncomfortable) I'll help her, I promise, but I think you should tell me where the Stones are!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you love her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... I don't know! We hardly know each other... it takes time!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have time... I need to know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, the last time I admitted to a woman I loved her ... I never saw her again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would like to have died in peace...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Diva's eyes close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The timer on Zorg's bomb clicks over to "15 minutes".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You tell me to save the world then you go off and leave me in the shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shakes her, gently slapping her cheeks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on! You're not gonna die in peace! You're not going to die at all! You hear me? Where are the Stones?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg sets the Sacred Case on a table in the cockpit.  He complacent smile:                It's empty! He cannot believe his eyes.  He goes berserk, destroying sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben slaps the Diva soundly.  She comes around somewhat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, but... the Stones...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (very weak) They are... with me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Diva dies.  Blue blood streams from her mouth.  Korbe Diva but doesn't find anything.  The shooting slowly stop The Mangalores are now in total control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay calm and nobody will get hurt! Hands on your head and into the hall!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guests comply

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself) ...The Stones are with me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and then it occurs to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...In me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He touches the Diva's stomach and senses something hard. himself, he sticks his hand in the wound and pulls out a Then another.  And another.  Korben pulls out all four St blood.  Everyone has left the theater.  The Mangalores ch by one. Loc Rhod peeks out from under a seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you think we'd better be going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Mangalore spots Korben kneeling alongside the Diva.  He the shoulder and pokes him with his gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you! With the others!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben spins and, in one swift motion, breaks his arm.  J starters.  Another WARRIOR rushes over.  Korben punches h and snatches the gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it... I've had... all day people have been sticking guns in my face...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben wraps up the four Stones in his shirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben man... These dudes are going to waste us if we don't do what they say.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben gives him the package and grabs his mike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't do what I say... I'll waste you myself. Got it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: President Lindberg dabs his sweaty face with a towel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Akanit is still in the police station facing control scre into a walkie-talkie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the situation in the hall?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hostages are being gathered in the middle of the hall.  T surrounded by Mangalores who guard them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into walkie-talkie) There's no more resistance. Everything's under control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three Mangalores are suddenly blasted through the glass d the theater.  Korben bursts into the hall, two huge guns

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben takes out two more WARRIORS coming towards him, ro column. Laser bullets stinging all around his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is amazing! Korben, Korben Dallas, the winner of the Gemini Croquette contest just killed three warriors like he was swatting flies...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Panic everywhere!  Heavy firing fills the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roy von Bacon, the laserball player, rises from the floor Mangalore, grabs him and smashes his head into a column,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two Mangalores firing a huge machine gun at the column Ko for cover. He dives for cover behind the bar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two Mangalores watch awestruck.  Roy whistles behind them Mangalores turn around.  Roy bonks their heads together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Roy von Bacon, the Lions center forward joining in the battle...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone taps Loc Rhod on the shoulder.  He jumps with fri

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hot to trot) All this is terribly exciting, hmmm?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loc Rhod covers his mike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GET OFF MY BACK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Mangalore shoots in their direction.  Loc Rhod flattens floor.  A vase falls on the Princess knocking her out.  A some missiles in his gun and destroys the bar piece by pi move forward.  Korben motions to Baby Ray hiding under th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toss me the balls!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (terrified, still deaf) What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another piece of the bar explodes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The balls for Christ's sake!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben apes playing pool, but Baby Ray really is stone-de

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wants the balls! You deaf or something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The EMPEROR rolls the balls over to Korben.  The Mangalor missiles and shatters another part of the bar.  Korben hi bit left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How far is he from here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The EMPEROR glances at the Mangalore, who in reloading.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd say about thirty yards to the left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben hefts the ball, jumps up and hurls it with blindin Mangalore catches it right in the head.  He drops, firing missile strikes the ceiling which collapses on him.  The a thumb's up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...And our man Korben has literally knocked out the opposition with an amazing 90 foot pitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The COPS on the floor rise, scoop up weapons from dead Ma down a line of fire at the last of the fleeing rebels . R in victory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for your help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forget it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben grabs Loc Rhod and takes him with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben bursts into the room. He stares at the luminous ba to the ground and sees the hole Leeloo escaped through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo???

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo in bleeding all over.  She can barely move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (feeble) Kor... ban...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ZFX 200 speeds back toward Fhloston Paradise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bomb timer now reads 10 minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last of the Mangalores have barricaded themselves in station and shoot at anything that tries to enter.  Korbe policemen already there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, who are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The winner of the Gemini Croquette contest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben goes to the door and peeks around the corner.  Loc

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seven to the left. Five to the right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's he doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben leans around the corner and fires rapidly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six to the left. One to the right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's on vacation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reloading) We got to find the leader. Mangalores don't fight without a leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Akanit gets up, grabs Cornelius by the throat and put a g

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One more shot and we start killing hostages, got that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Found him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tense) Send someone to negotiate!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mind if I go? I'm an excellent negotiator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... Sure, go ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben gets ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're sending someone in who's authorized to negotiate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben walks quickly into the room, heads straight for Ak gun and puts a bullet through his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyone else want to negotiate?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to another Cop) Where'd he learn to negotiate like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President gives Munro a hard look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The police round up the remaining Mangalores.  Korben is center screens trying to find Leeloo.  Cornelius comes ov embarrassed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're probably very angry with me and I quite understand. But I want you to know I'm fighting for a noble cause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I know... to save the world... but right now all I want to do is save Leeloo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo's in trouble?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When is she not in trouble?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh.. Have you tried the Diva's suite?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben realizes that Cornelius in probably right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ZFX200 settles in the landing dock garage.  SECURITY the ship just as Zorg in getting out holding the ZF1.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More trouble?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing I can't fix myself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He brings up the ZF1 and wipes out the garage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben enters the Diva's suite which is in shambles.  He everywhere, but finds nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo lies in a pool of blood.  She hears something belo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exhausted, Loc Rhod wipes his forehead and finds himself with the bomb stuck on the wall. Korben in busy looking for Leeloo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (loudly) Leeloo?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up in the airshaft, Leeloo has heard him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her voice is too weak, Korben can't hear her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben man... what the hell is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben gives the bomb a prefunctory glance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A molecular bomb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three minutes left on the timer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (increasingly worried) And, uh, what're these numbers clicking by?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Probably the time remaining before it explodes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius smiles and continues his search.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (weak smile) You're just saying that to scare me! Right? If it was a bomb, an alarm would've gone off. There's bomb detectors in all these hotels!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A general alarm goes off.  Loc Rhod is crushed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights flicker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a Type A alert. For security reasons the hotel must be evacuated. Please proceed calmly to the lifeboats located in the main hallways.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A wave of panic engulfs the hall.  The cops are unable to crowd as it stampedes to the exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg marches down the corridor shooting everyone in his p

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loc Rhod stands paralyzed in front of the flashing timer. minutes left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe we oughta be going, what do you think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not without Leeloo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loc Rhod cannot take his eyes off the bomb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like D-Man, I hate to bother you but uh, like, we're down to 2 minutes here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben breathes out, bothered.  He turns his attention to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the latest model.. I've never seen one before... it works off a magnetic coded card... Let's see if I can rig it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo sticks her fingers out one of the bullet holes and her blood drip down. The blood splats on Korben's hand.  He snaps his head up immediately who is up there.  He forgets about the bomb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! What are you doing? The bomb!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben drags the desk over, jumps on it and pokes his hea airshaft He spots Leeloo who gives him a weak smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, I'm here now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls her toward him, helps her out of the shaft and s on the desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just relax. I've got the Stones. Everything's going to be fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 30 seconds left on the timer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (falling to pieces) Like Korben, can I have 30 seconds of your time here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Leeloo) I'll be right back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben dashes over to the bomb.  He is stopped by the bar Zorg, in person, holding a magnetic card.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling) Allow me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg slips a small magnetic card in the bomb, it starts t from 5 minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just for the fun of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loc Rhod faints.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, what do we have here? Is this Korben Dallas? The famous winner of the Gemini Croquette contest? Or is this Korben Dallas from Special Section sent by old Lindberg himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben doesn't reply.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...In any event, whoever you are, I was glad to meet you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg fires at Korben who figures he is dead.  Nothing.  Z Nada.  The clip is empty.  Zorg starts to panic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...A 3000 round clip! I didn't fire off 3000 rounds... did I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you know how to count. It's not all that hard. Watch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben punches him square in the face, shows him his inde

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One! That's for trying to kill me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Second Punch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two! That's for firing me! Three! That's for pushing around a priest! And the rest is for what you did to my wife!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben pummels him mercilessly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: President Lindberg prefers closing his eyes.  Munro's sho if he were beating on Zorg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg falls to the floor, beaten to a pulp.  The timer cli minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're outta here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He picks Leeloo up in his arms. Cornelius grabs Loc Rhod and gives him a resounding slap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you nuts, Father? That hurts! I can't feel my teeth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doesn't matter all you need are your legs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lifeboats launch from the hotel and fly out into spac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben, carrying Leeloo, Cornelius and Loc Rhod are in th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two minutes to complete evacuation...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben bursts the lock on the first ship he finds and ent Cornelius and Loc Rhod.  The ZFX200.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg starts to come around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben sets Leeloo down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg picks up his ZF1, unaware of the bomb and the countd

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't fire three thousand rounds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One minute to total evacuation...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know how to fly this thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (concentrating) It's like a cab isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 30 seconds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyone know how to release the lines on this crate?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg is busy with the ZF1 when the bomb starts to BEEP si ten seconds.  Zorg is terror stricken.  He pushes a butto ZF1 over his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (loudly) Maximum Protection.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mauve-colored magnetic shield closes around Zorg like a sarcophagus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius and Loc Rhod are bent over the buttons looking release the lines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Found it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loc Rhod searches frantically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't even know what I'm looking for!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck it! Hold tight!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben slams the throttle into full forward.  The ship ro the lines to shreds. Loc Rhod is thrown to the rear of the ship.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: The counter goes 1... 0 -The suite disintegrates - The corridor is consumed. -The main hall is no more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ZFX200 jets away as the enormous oceanliner explodes

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship stops shaking.  That was a close one.  Everyone'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solid little jobs, aren't they?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (broadcasting, exhausted) Dear listeners, your favorite DJ is alive and kicking. It's seven o'clock and time for the news. Tune in tomorrow for another adventure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beep. End of transmission.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loc Rhod lets out a huge sigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the others) The best show I ever did!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A magnetic sarcophagus crosses the Fhloston sky and crash glacier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg appears in the middle of the ice.  He takes a portab the ZF1.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's that? Can you hear me better now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Mr. Zorg, I hear you perfectly! So, how was the concert?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who gives a shit! I didn't come here to listen to music! Listen up instead of running off at the mouth! The batteries on my phone are almost gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Sir!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dispatch me another ZFX200 immediately. Someone stole mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right away, Sir. I'll send you a new one to the hotel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not at the hotel!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Battery dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zorg is all alone, lost, in the middle of the glacier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself) Stay calm.... stay calm...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General Munro enters the office with a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Major Dallas has the Five Elements on board. The priest is guiding them directly to the temple.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: President Lindberg closes his eyes in relief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank God! We've been saved!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SCIENTIST rushes in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. President.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes? Now, what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A ball of fire, all-powerful Evil, speeds across the scre Federal Army warships following along behind it as best t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean, "its advancing"?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not only advancing, but it's moving at incredible speed! We're having trouble following it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Scientist) ...And... Do you have any idea where it's heading?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scientist is hard to put to answer, he shakes his hea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben gently wipes Leeloo's forehead with a cloth.  She little.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gentle, loving) Apipoulai..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo smiles, weakly, feverish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm so very sad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why? We did pretty well, wouldn't you say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five hundred wars... Arms... Drugs... Money... Everything you create is used to destroy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you not to read all that crap!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Protect life... Until death.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her eyes close and she falls back asleep.  Korben is worr so depressed.  Cornelius enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a General on the phone... His name's Mambo, I think.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Munro here. President Lindberg wants to talk to you.  Hold the line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President clears his throat and takes the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Major, first off, I want to thank you, in my name and in the name of the Federation...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the praiseworthy courage you have shown us! I'd like to congratulate General Munro for his choice. He found the ideal man for such a...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the point) So now what's the problem?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President drops into his armchair and sighs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a ball of fire 1,200 miles in diameter heading straight for the earth. And we have no idea how to stop it! ...That's the problem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben thinks fast.  The Priest is with him.  The Five El board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much time before the collision?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President queries the scientist with a nod of the hea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If its speed remains constant... in an hour and 57 minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll call you back in two hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben hangs up.  The President looks stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ZFX200 shifts to the speed of light and vanishes in t cosmos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David is asleep.  He is woken by the sound of...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ZFX200 is parked in the middle of the desert. Korben walks ahead carrying Leeloo.  Cornelius has the fo him. Barely awake, Loc Rhod stumbles along.  David appears at chapel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're all safe. Thanks be to God!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Later, David! Later! There's not a minute to lose!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The small group enters the chapel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius pushes the group onto the altar which is surrou barrier.  Cornelius stands in front of the cross.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me, Father, but... could we pray later?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius bends the cross and pushes it down.  A mechanis lowering the altar like a service elevator. The altar descends amid rocky walls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They just landed in the desert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sweating) How much time is left?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earth is in view.  The Dark Planet fills the screen and h blue planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About nine minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: President Lindberg has trouble breathing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lit by torches, Korben sets Leeloo delicately on the alta center of the four elements.  Cornelius looks over the fo which way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (panic-stricken) Uh, this one... must be water!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's obvious he doesn't know where to put it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't tell me you don't know how all this works?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Theoretically, yes! The four Stones form the beam and the Fifth Element is supposed to stand in the middle there, but... I don't have the reference book. I've never seen the Stones work!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben can't believe his ears.  He tears the Stone out of and studies the inscriptions.  He goes over to one of the stones rest on and tries to figure it out.  The symbol of the same as on the base.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Match the symbols!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben places the first Stone and picks up another one. found the symbol for water.  Loc Rhod sits down.  He is v

dialogues.text: What is this some kinda game? Like chess?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben pulls him to his feet and sticks a Stone in his ha

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. It's much simpler. If we don't figure out where these Stones go in five minutes, we're all dead! Think you got it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loc Rhod's got it and runs over to put in his Stone.  The all in place but nothing happens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no light! You told me there were supposed to be four beams of light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (lost) Yes, of course, but... The Stones are shut! They have to be open for it to work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you don't know how they open, is that what you are saying?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I'm saying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Dark Planet closes in on Earth rapidly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben leans over Leeloo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo? The Stones! We have to open them! How does it work?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (feeble) The wind blows... the fire burns...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know all that, Leeloo! I'm talking about the Stones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...The rain falls...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben is desperate.  Leeloo's too weak, he won't get any of her. He darts over to a Stone and turns it over and over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rain falls... the wind blows?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loc Rhod stands in front of his Stone looking at Korben.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try and figure out how this fucking thing opens, instead of staring at me like that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loc Rhod starts feeling the Stone all around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (afraid) I'm looking, I'm looking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tension is palpable in the President's office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Three minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've lost contact with them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben and Cornelius turn the Stones every which way.  Al Loc Rhod is discouraged.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...we'll never make it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sighs.  Three hooks pop off the Stone.  Loc Rhod can't eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It... it moved! Korben! Korben!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben rushes over, looks at the Stone.  Hooks are undone

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you say? What did you do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing! Swear to God, I didn't do nothing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, you did something that set it off. Try to remember. Concentrate. Tell me exactly what you did!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loc Rhod tries to duplicate the same movement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was like this... With my hands here and... I said, "We'll never make it!" That's all!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing happens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that all?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... then I sighed... like this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loc Rhod sighs, really depressed this time.  The Stone op Korben's got it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wind! The wind blows...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben blows on the Stone which immediately opens reveali blue sky with some miniature clouds floating around insid pops up like a ray of sunlight, like Korben's smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quickly, everyone on a Stone! Water for water!  Fire for fire! Earth for earth!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two men move fast.  Korben on the 4th Stone: Earth. fistful of earth  and throws it on the Stone.  A miniatur appears and immediately forms a green beam.  Cornelius wi with a scarf and wrings it out over the Stone.  It opens miniature raging sea.  A blue beam appears. Loc Rhod has a problem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shaking) I don't have a light.  I stopped smoking last week! If we'd come a bit sooner...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben pats his pockets, he comes up with a box of matche one left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't breathe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loc Rhod and Cornelius hold their breath.  Korben strikes small flame appears on the tip.  A breeze goes through th feels like he's got TNT in his hands.  He approaches the The flame twists, dims, flickers ...but holds on.  The St of miniature fire appears. Korben sighs, snuffs out the m beam, a red one, immediately forms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mass of fire fills the screen.  The Earth is only a tho away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two more minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President shuts his eyes.  His lids move in prayer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben helps Leeloo onto her feet where the four beams an crisscross.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's up to you now, Angel!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm so tired...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can sleep tomorrow... come on...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want to sleep... forever...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo! Listen to me! I'll take you on a vacation afterwards! A real vacation, this time, for as long as you want. Come on! You can do it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Korben slowly releases Leeloo and steps back from the alt Leeloo can barely stand in the center of the four beams. An indistinct white beam begins to form around her, start

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on Leeloo! Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The beam loses its intensity.  Leeloo crumples to the flo

dialogues.text: The Dark Planet hurtles toward Earth.  A hundred miles be The African continent is visible.  No doubt about it: heading right for Egypt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seconds tick away relentlessly on the scientist's stopwat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'll be entering the atmosphere in one minute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The heat in the temple is unbearable.  All the walls star same horrible black slimy liquid seen at Zorg's.  A drop the temple floor and begins to smoke, eating away at it l Rhod has to dodge another drop of the stuff.  Korben quic Leeloo up and puts her back in the center of the beams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo! If you don't get on with the program we're all gonna die! And that's not on my agenda for today.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo wraps her arms around Korben's neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (weak) What's the use of saving lives... when you see what you do with them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right but there are lots of good things... beautiful things...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Like love...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exactly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I don't know love... I'm like a machine programmed to save other people's lives but never to have one of my own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Scientist's stopwatch goes from 30 to 29 seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have thousands of memories but none of them are mine... There is no need for me other than this. I'm immortal but I have no life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, you do! I need you. More than you can imagine! Stand up straight!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?... Why would you need me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself) Tell her, for God's sake!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bit of the black acid falls on Loc Rhod's shirt setting rips if off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leeloo has tears in her eyes.  The heat is overpowering. everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Despite her fatigue, Leeloo smiles broadly.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO

dialogues.text: Now you're allowed to kiss me.

dialogues.text: - Korben wraps his arms around her and kisses her like he anybody before.  - The white beam, the Divine Light, imme around Leeloo and Korben. - The stopwatch hits zero.  - T explodes from the top of the pyramid and heads straight i the fireball smack in the middle, slowing it down.  - Kor like there was no tomorrow. - The beam hardens and slowly solidifies the Evil Planet. screeches escape from the dying planet.  Screeches of ter million souls were dying. - Streams of black acid spurt from the pyramid and solidi brilliant stalactites.

dialogues.text: The pure beam, the Light of Life, has finished its work. nothing more than a dead planet. Strangely enough, it looks like the moon.  Everything is

dialogues.text: President Lindberg opens his eyes and realizes he's not d

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the temple, the beam loses its intensity.  But Leeloo remain stuck together, lost in their kiss.  Cornelius has knees, clutching his hands. Loc Rhod slips along the wall with a sigh.  He gives Corn smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This guy is a killer with the babes. I knew it from the moment I laid eyes on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cornelius and Loc Rhod burst out laughing.  Korben and Le kissing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are in the Nucleological Laboratory that gave birth to beginning of our story.  The President enters the lab fol of officials in ceremonial dress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. President, let me introduce you to Professor Mactilburgh, who runs the center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's an honor to receive you. Mr. President.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beaming) Yes.. Well? Where are our two heroes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They were so tired from their ordeal that we put them in the reactor this morning..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have 19 more meetings after this one Professor..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course.. Let me see if they're revived.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We go live in one minute, Mr. President.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mactilburgh goes to the reactor and opens a small slot wh to see what is going on under the blue shield. Leeloo and Korben are naked, arms wrapped around each oth probably engaged in hoppi hoppa. Mactilburgh looks troubled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I.. uh.. they need five more minutes, Mr. President.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President, pressed for time, looks over to his aide w with a phone call.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No ma'am... I tried... No ma'am...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some woman... claims she's Korben's mother...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give it here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President takes the phone and goes to the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mrs. Dallas, this in the President. On behalf of the entire Federation, I would like to thank...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't pull that crap with me, Finger... I'd recognize that trash can voice of yours in a dark alley during a rain storm. You tell that worthless no account son of mine he should plotz for the way he's ignored his mother... when I think of all I sacrificed for him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
